content:
Paul Levy writes:

The University of Birmingham is recruiting assistant/associate professors in the School of Computer Science. The Theory of Computation group at Birmingham is world-renowned and we have been actively recruiting new researchers for some years now. More information about the group: https://tinyurl.com/yb4u9kze<https://tinyurl.com/yb4u9kze>

For informal enquiries, please contact Anupam Das, Martin Escardo, Paul Levy or any other member of the group.

https://www.jobs.ac.uk/job/DOI907/assistant-or-associate-professor-in-computer-science-research-and-education<https://www.jobs.ac.uk/job/DOI907/assistant-or-associate-professor-in-computer-science-research-and-education>
